entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
